fields.text: If you are not sure how to spell a word, you;

options.text: spell it out loud or in your head
you write it down until it looks right
you draw it in the air with your finger

fields.text: When you see the word "cat," what do you do first?

options.text: Picture a cat in your mind
Think about being with a cat (petting it or hearing it purr)

fields.text: I am good at taking tests
